This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, considering your interest and alignment with our product's capabilities. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the full benefits at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:

(2) Reject Alice's offer
